description: Give a pet Honey Bee. (Summon a 1/1 Bee after fainting.)
Give a pet +3⚔ and +3💖 until end of battle.
Give a pet Bone Attack. (Attack for 5⚔ more damage.)
Give a pet Garlic Armor. (Take 2 damage less.)
Give all current and future shop pets +2⚔ and +1💖.
Give a pet Splash Attack. (Attack second enemy for 5⚔ damage.)
Give a pet Melon Armor. (Take 20 damage less, once.)
Give a pet Extra Life. (Come back as a 1/1 after fainting.)
Give a pet Steak Attack. (Attack for 20⚔ more damage, once.)
